title: Cutting
subTitle: The order was cut poorly, causing white or uneven borders and/or disappearing elements.
action:
Check the order description on Presta
Look for option rectangular/custom size
Possible custom size orders: 
Stickers
Posters
Banners
Flags

options.action: Ask the customer to measure the received product, does it match the size in order description?

question.text: Is the product clearly cut off center?

questions.title: Is the product clearly cut off center?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

options.action: Open the file in indesign and offset the page by 3mm then compare with the customers pictures
Open the cPDF and check the bleed area, is it processed correctly?

question.text: White borders cut that weren't in he cPDF?
What type of order is this?

questions.title: Is the product clearly cut off center?
White borders cut that weren't in the cPDF?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

solution.title: Cutting
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Please reach out to traffic so they are able to contact the suplier before the reprint experiences the same issue.

questions.title: Is the product clearly cut off center?
White borders cut that weren't in the cPDF?
Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The order has been stapled and cut correctly, no mistake has been made on our end.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: The order cut correctly, and no mistake has been made on our end. However, as a gesture of goodwill for a new customer, we can offer a refund in case you can not use the product.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description: The orde cut correctly, and no mistake has been made on our end. As a returning customer, we can offer a 10% discount on the current order or provide a voucher for a future purchase. Please let us know which option you prefer.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill

solution.title: Cutting
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Please reach out to traffic so they are able to contact the suplier before the reprint experiences the same issue.

questions.title: Is the product clearly cut off center?
White borders cut that weren't in the cPDF?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The supplier has altered the cPDF and removed the bleed zone causing white borders to appear after a cutting deviation.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: The printer has cut the product incorrectly, causing the design to be off center. We apologize for this error. We can offer a discount or reprint the order with the correct cuts. If a reprint is no longer feasible, we can issue a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will make the necessary arrangements.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier Complaint Type: Cutting

solution.title: Cutting
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Reprint with same file

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier Complaint Type: Cutting

options.action: Look for 'Cutcontour' spot plate in the 'Output preview' tab in Acrobat
Automatic: Open the DTP Tab in Presta & check 'AutoCheck Artwork' box. Manual: 'Open the DTP Tab in Presta, check 'Attachments' box, and see agent name under 'Uploaded by.

solution.title: Cutting
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Reprocess the file correctly to the template
Send an 'Artwork Altered' warning

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The agent did not add or fix the cutcontour to the cPDF causing the supplier to process it as a rectangular cut product.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: Our agent did not add or fix the cut contour to your PDF, which resulted in the printer processing it as a rectangular cut product instead. We apologize for this oversight. To resolve the issue, we can offer a discount or reprint the product with the correct cut contour. If a reprint is no longer feasible, we can issue a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will make the necessary arrangements.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork - Manual Checked Complaint Type: Incorrectly processed

solution.title: Cutting
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Reprocess the file correctly to the template
Send the order number to Quinten

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Autocheck did not add or fix the cutcontour to the cPDF causing the supplier to process it as a rectangular cut product.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: Our automatic artwork checking system did not add or fix the cut contour to your PDF, which resulted in the printer processing it as a rectangular cut product instead. We apologize for this oversight. To resolve the issue, we can offer a discount or reprint the product with the correct cut contour. If a reprint is no longer feasible, we can issue a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will make the necessary arrangements.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork Automatic check Complaint Type: Orientation issue

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

options.action:
Check the Cutcontour in Illustrator
Is the line weight correct?
100% Magenta spot colour?
Correct 'Cutcontour' name?
Is the cutcontour a closed shape? (look for unconnected anchorpoints)
Automatic: Open the DTP Tab in Presta & check 'AutoCheck Artwork' box. Manual: 'Open the DTP Tab in Presta, check 'Attachments' box, and see agent name under 'Uploaded by.

solution.title: Cutting
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Reprocess the file correctly to the template
Send an 'Artwork Altered' warning

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The agent did not add or fix the cutcontour to the cPDF causing the supplier to process it as a rectangular cut product.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: Our agent did not add or fix the cut contour to your PDF, which resulted in the printer processing it as a rectangular cut product instead. We apologize for this oversight. To resolve the issue, we can offer a discount or reprint the product with the correct cut contour. If a reprint is no longer feasible, we can issue a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will make the necessary arrangements.

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The supplier has cut the product incorrectly because of not following the submitted cutcontour line. This caused the customer to receive an incorrect product.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: The printer has cut the product incorrectly, causing the final product to be a square instead of a custom shape. We apologize for this error. We can offer a discount or reprint the order with the correct cuts. If a reprint is no longer feasible, we can issue a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will make the necessary arrangements.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier Complaint Type: Cutting
